title: switch to new rtmp feed
body:
currently we are doing:

    msdl -> ffmpeg -> nginx-rtmp -> hls
                                    |
                                    +-> ffserver

the msdl -> ffmpeg -> nginx-rtmp is done by msdl-worker, we can simply switch to the new rtmp feed once we have the committee / channel id mapping.

title: 影城: add live status feed
body: the new imvod.ly site has metadata about current speakers for committees on air

title: automate daily dump
body:
for:
- bulk download
- backup
- development bootstrap

title: f={"field":false} does not exclude field
body:
f={"motions":false} in the following query doesn't exclude the field.
  http://api.ly.g0v.tw/v0/collections/sittings?f={"motions":false,"videos":false}&l=2

Not sure this is a bug, or feature request ;)

body:
公聽會:
* decide primary key
* from calendar (type = 'hearing')
* from ivod (related entries)
* from npl (reports)

title: api stats
body:
investigate options for collecting endpoint stats:
* hits
* response time

title: work around misq issues bringing in motions from extra sessions
body:
for example: http://ly.g0v.tw/bills/882G14626

this is because misq agenda/proceeding query returns entries for 08-03T01-YS-01 along when requesting for 08-03-YS-01

title: data integrity check: committee reports and bills
body:
we should produce a list of reports and bills that we _don't_ have proposed amendment extracted.

we can simply do a query (or corresponding api.ly query):

    ly=# select bill_id from bills where summary like '報告%' and bill_ref is not null

all items should contain `data` field with lawdiff content

ditto for bills.

title: Unexpected committee value of calendar
body:
as well as the sitting_id. Use this request as example

http://api-beta.ly.g0v.tw/v0/collections/calendar?q={"date":{"$gt":"2013-10-27","$lt":"2013-11-03"}}&l=100

we got this entry

      {
         "chair" : "張慶忠",
         "type" : "sitting",
         "committee" : [
            "內政委員會",
            "司法及法制委員"
         ],
         "name" : "立法院第8屆第4會期內政、司法及法制委員會第1次聯席會議：",
         "sitting_id" : "08-04-內政委員會-司法及法制委員-01",
      },

body: 全日影片 waveform (kcwu) (轉 wav 檔 > 2g 會炸掉, 需要用 w64 或拆成小檔處理)

title: /bills/:id/motions should just be pulling the /motions collection
body: currently it's using the defined column in the bills view

title: merge sitting summary when different
body: a sitting might have multiple calendar entries. most of the time the summary (of agenda) are the same across those entries.  sometimes they are splitted into each calendar entry.  we should merge them when populating sitting summary.

title: import 臨時提案 from npl tts
body: 函復 contains the link to the ttsmotion entry (primary key is tts_id + tts_seq)

title: api.ly may be rejected by chrome due to cross domain access
body: XMLHttpRequest cannot load http://api.ly.g0v.tw/v0/collections/debates?l=30&sk=0. Origin http://ly.g0v.tw is not allowed by Access-Control-Allow-Origin.

title: automate npl (tts) data import
body:
on new YS calendar entry:
* get tts bills for the particular sitting
* upsert with bill_ref and populate bills and amendments

on new gazette publish (with some delays)
* get tts motions for the new sittings covered (or just incrementally query with dates?)
* upsert with tts_id + tts_seq

title: decide mly primary key
body:
12:08 < clkao> pofeng_: 我在想用「第一次當立委的屆+座號」當 primary key
12:09 < pofeng_> clkao: 第一次(?) ... 可不可暫時先用第幾屆
12:09 < clkao> 這樣他當兩屆就有兩個 id ?
12:09 < clkao> 所以才說第一次的

basically the stage (term) + lgno in https://github.com/ronnywang/TWLegislativeYuanData/blob/09c259cfe44b7e4ac7629ed834b2a11bb82d8aa7/8.json

however we should use the first term an individual is appointed plus the lgno to avoid duplication
